attributes.action: Remove GP at Hand (Babylon) as a NHS provider.
attributes.background: GP at Hand is a service endorsed by the NHS that allows a person to de-register with their GP and register as a patient with GP at Hand. Unfortunately, Babylon who provide GP at Hand are cutting corners. They are de-registering patients from their current GP without consent & without notifying them.

rejection.details:
The GP at Hand service is commissioned by the Hammersmith and Fulham Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG), not the UK Government. 

You may wish to raise this issue with them directly. You can find out how to contact them here:  http://www.hammersmithfulhamccg.nhs.uk/contact-us.aspx
